name: dodging
content:
Add to word list

present participle of
dodge
[ I or T ] to avoid being hit by something by moving quickly to one side: He dodged to avoid the hurtling bicycle.
[ T ] to avoid something unpleasant: The Senator dodged questions about his relationship with the actress.
